content: ***about this pattern*** this hilarious digital reindeer christmas sweater features a reindeer with moving eyes the eyes are created with a free app and smartphone the pattern includes instructions for sizes s up to 3xl s/m bust 36 length 21 / bust 92 cm length 54cm l/xl bust 44 length 22 5 / bust 112 cm length 57cm xxl / xxxl bust 52 length 23 5 / bust 132 cm length 60cm this pattern contains explained written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 7 pages including the cover page and 2 graphs available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/reindeer-christmas-sweater/ ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg
